This is a quality, watchable release.

A few minor nits to pick:

There are 4 or 5 major unsyncing issues, which were it live actors would make it near unwatchable, however as the main characters are CG turtles, it gets a pass. This is most notable when a small part of audio spoken by Max Winters is repeated just after the turtles encounter the first monster.

The video is very sharp for a TS though it still suffers from a slightly washed out appearance and is overall too dark, especially for a dark movie where much of the detail is lost to the shadows. Otherwise, very good quality there, but it seems there are some cropping issues, most notable during the opening when text can be seen only partially on the screen.

On the whole:
Video - 8/10 Good, if a little dark and slightly cropped.
Audio - 6/10 Very clear but unsynced.

P.S: -- People should only comment on content they have viewed
